newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - Amcor says facing difficult year.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - Amcor says facing difficult year.

text.p: SYDNEY, Oct 25 (Retuer) - Amcor Ltd Ltd manging director Don Macfarlane said on Friday that the paper and packaging company faced a difficult year but improvements were expected to be gained from cost cutting and increased operating margins.
"On present indications Amcor faces a difficult year," Macfarlane said, without making a specific forecast on the profit outlook.
He said the company wanted to increase its return on investments from recent projects as well as increase operatinhg margisn by reducing costs.
Macfarlane said at the annual general meeting that the company was also undertaking a review of its organisational structure with the help of outside consultants.
He said operations in Germany and the United States were being reviewed to either increase their operating performance or rationalise them.
